author: Joseph Ax
title: Early Voting In Ohio Begins Despite Ongoing Fight Over U.S. Congressional Map

sentence: Article content In response, the Republican-controlled state redistricting commission, including Republican Governor Mike DeWine, approved a second map last month that made some changes but still gave the party an edge.
